docs.abstract: Health experts convened by World Health Organization release guidelines for responding to global health crises, after West African Ebola epidemic which killed over 11,000 people; panel asserts United Nations-affiliated WHO should be protected from political influence by independent overseer, and have its capacities streamlined and strengthened.
